meta.scope: Cross-platform audit of PDUFA.BIO website and ODIN mobile ecosystem
meta.assessment: Strong technical foundation with excellent content quality. Primary gaps: deep linking implementation, app store readiness, and real-time notifications.

strengths: Strong quantitative trust signals (0.88 AUC, 96.6% win rate)
weaknesses: Missing dynamic Schema.org markup for financial events
No SoftwareApplication schema for ODIN AI engine
Page load speeds depend heavily on pagination of 360+ events

strengths: Open in App button on detail pages
weaknesses: Deep linking not fully bulletproof (requires expo-linking robust config)
Smart banner needs conditional rendering for iOS/Android user agents only
Fallback URLs to App Store/Play Store missing (app not yet published)

strengths: Track record ledger is incredibly compelling (57/59 accuracy)
0.88 AUC and 96.6% win rate prominently displayed
Clear distinction between AI scoring and financial advice
weaknesses: Terminology barrier for new users (Logistic Regression, AUC)

strengths: Intuitive top navigation (Dashboard, Calendar, Screener, Track Record)
Heatmap visualization is excellent high-level view
weaknesses: Heatmap requires horizontal scrolling on mobile (cramped feel)
Watchlist requires account creation before first star (increases bounce rate)
ODIN Score lacks lightweight tooltip explaining primary weights

strengths: Modular architecture allows future native Kotlin modules if needed
Clean separation between web and mobile repos
weaknesses: AsyncStorage should migrate to react-native-mmkv for synchronous high-speed reads
No stale-while-revalidate strategy for rapid state changes during market hours
Database migration versioning needs formalization (Prisma or Supabase CLI)

critical_findings.finding: Deep linking must seamlessly hand off complex URLs into nested React Navigation screens
critical_findings.impact: Primary acquisition funnel is web-to-app. Broken deep links = lost users.
critical_findings.recommendation: Bulletproof expo-linking configuration with URL pattern matching and fallback handling

critical_findings.finding: App store listing screenshots must feature 0.88 AUC and 96.6% win rate prominently
critical_findings.impact: This is the unique value proposition that differentiates ODIN from free calendars
critical_findings.recommendation: Create 5 screenshots: (1) Track record ledger, (2) ODIN score breakdown, (3) Catalyst heatmap, (4) Push notification mockup, (5) Watchlist view

critical_findings.finding: Notification payload must include ticker symbol and ODIN score on lock screen
critical_findings.impact: Users get immediate value without opening app = higher retention
critical_findings.recommendation: Rich notification format: ALDX PDUFA Tomorrow | TIER_4 (1% approval) | Tap to review

must_do_before_launch.description: The primary acquisition funnel is web-to-app. Deep links must work flawlessly.
Screenshots must feature 0.88 AUC and 96.6% win rate prominently
Include ticker and ODIN score on lock screen
